items.sentence: I was surprised how many people came to meet us at the airport.
If you\'d moved faster, you\'d\'ve been able to catch the ball.
Tom said he didn\'t answer Mary\'s letter, because he was busy.
I doubt that Tom planned to spend so much time on that project.
I found it difficult to make myself heard because of the noise.
The last time I saw Mary she was dressed in a nurse\'s uniform.
I put some cookies on the table and the kids ate them right up.
If Mary knew how to swim, she would go to the beach more often.
I think we need to be very careful not to hurt Tom\'s feelings.
Tom has a reputation of never letting anyone else say anything.
